original_text: And it came to pass after this, that the king of the children of Ammon died, and Hanun his son reigned in his stead.
korean_text: 그 후에 암몬 자손의 왕이 죽고 그의 아들 하눈이 대신하여 왕이 되니

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass after this
that the king of the children of Ammon died
and Hanun his son reigned in his stead
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 하눈이 그를 대신하여 왕이 되었더라
